EmailTemplate.description: This is sent to APMs when expenses and attendances have to be approved before the deadline
EmailTemplate.name: SF to APM/PM: Expenses to approve
EmailTemplate.subject: Please double check your expenses for {!Wave__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Wave__c.APM_first_name_del__c},
As {!Wave__c.Name} has now finished, this is a gentle reminder to approve all expenses for the summer staff. If you have not yet done this, please do so as a matter of priority, as the expenses and payroll will be processed by Evolution tomorrow.
To review your expenses, please go to your views on Expenses: https://na8.salesforce.com/a1P/o
Thanks!
This is a standard email, sent automatically when a wave ends. PMs are copied into this email.
